participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Frustrated and overwhelmed by personal life, seeking change.
participant_1.background: my wife spends all my money. i'm 40 years old. i am planning on getting a divorce. i hate my job.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and introspective, enjoys escapism through gaming.
participant_2.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. i dye my hair every three months. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

content.text: children need love   and my wife makes more money
